## Description

Get the number of rows (nrow)


## Usage

```r
list(list("nrow"), list("giottoPoints"))(x)
list(list("nrow"), list("giottoPolygon"))(x)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`x`     |     giottoPoints or giottoPolygon object
